import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.css'] }) export class AboutComponent { }

Kyle O'Keeffe

View Resume
My name is Kyle O’Keeffe and I am a recent graduate (Aug 2023) of the Software Engineering Technician program at Centennial College in Toronto, Canada. I am capable developing in C#, Java, TypeScript, Python, Kotlin, Sql, HTML5/CSS3 and JavaScript. My greatest strengths lie in developing standalone applications using C# or Java, and am very comfortable builing Full-stack Web Apps using a .NET or MEAN Stack with Angular front-ends. I have significant experience developing SQL queries and views in a production environment, which I gained during my Co-op position as an Automation developer/QA Testing support with the Ontario Public Service. This position also provided me experience with developing a standalone provess automation application for streamlining the QA regression testing operations.
In addition to my work as a developer, I have employment experience in a range of fields including Program and Policy Research Analysis, Logistics Inventory Analysis. My passion for software development orginated in my previous employment roles, where I recognized the value that custom-made software and automation solutions can add to our work and personal lives. Prior to my education at Centennial College, I have also completed a post-graduate certificate in Research Analysis from Georgian College and a Bachelors degree in History from Carleton University.
